thread.section_title: Ann Summers Ltd Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.annsummers.com
thread.title: Beth
thread.title_full: Ann Summers Ltd reviewed by Beth

author: Beth
title: Beth
text:
My package arrived at my boyfriend's work (the address I chose) with my ex boyfriend's name on it.
Completely unacceptable!
I had bought from Ann summers many years ago but always using anonymous checkout. I have never set up an account. But for some reason when my package arrived the name I had used many years ago appeared on it.
It's a good thing me and my bf have a brilliant relationship and he found it hilarious.
But I dont. It's clearly a huge cock up your end. Will not be ordering from you anymore. Love honey has gained a new customer.
